00013         CHAIN_TYPE_CRWD
00014         
00015 } chain_types;

00017 /* chain type crwd */
00018 
00019 typedef ssize_t (*f_crwd) (chain_t *, request_t *, buffer_t *);
00020 
00021 struct chain_t {
00022         char *      name;
00023         chain_types type;
00024         
00025         f_init      func_init;
00026         f_configure func_configure;
00027         f_destroy   func_destroy;
00028         union {
00029                 struct {
00030                         f_crwd  func_create;
00031                         f_crwd  func_set;
00032                         f_crwd  func_get;
00033                         f_crwd  func_delete;
00034                         f_crwd  func_move;
00035                         f_crwd  func_count;
00036                         f_crwd  func_custom;
00037                 } chain_type_crwd;
00038         };
00039         
00040         chain_t *   next;
00041         void *      user_data;
00042 };

00044 #define CHAIN_REGISTER(chain_info) \
00045         static void __attribute__((constructor))__chain_init_##chain_info() \
00046         { \
00047                 _chain_register(&chain_info); \
00048         }
00049
